short_summary: Psychologist(s) are required to provide specialized clinical psychological assessments and services to RCMP members.
description: Up to 2 contracts may be awarded for a period of two years with an option to extend for up to three additional one-year periods. The contract will be awarded based on the lowest evaluated price. This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number M5000-24-1333/A dated August 15th, 2023 with a closing of September 13th, 2023 at 14:00. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerees/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation. Psychologists will work an estimated 20 hours per week each, or one psychologist working an estimated 40 hours per week, to provide specialized clinical psychological assessments and services to RCMP members.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

**Psychologist Services**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking the services of up to two psychologists to support the mental health and well-being of its regular and civilian members. The selected psychologists will provide specialized clinical psychological assessments, conduct psychological debriefings, and deliver preventative health programs.

**Tender Details**

* Tender Reference Number: cb-249-26680455
* Amendment Number: 6
* Solicitation Number: M5000-24-1333/B
* Tender Closing Date: February 7, 2024, 3:00 PM EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

**Services Required**

The selected psychologists will provide the following services:

* Conduct specialized clinical psychological assessments to address fitness for duty, disability management, and performance-related issues
* Provide psychological debriefings within specialized sections and deployments
* Conduct psychological screening assessments for applicants to the RCMP
* Coordinate and deliver preventative health programs in collaboration with K Division Health Services team

**Evaluation Criteria**

The tender will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Mandatory technical requirements
* Lowest priced bid

**Submission Instructions**

Tenders must be submitted electronically to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at [NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca). Refer to the attached tender documents for more information.

**Important Notes**

* The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.
* Canada will make available Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), bid solicitations, and related documents for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).
* Indigenous businesses are encouraged to participate in this tender opportunity.

**Contact Information**

For more information, please contact Sheena Simonson at [sheena.simonson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:sheena.simonson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca) or 1306-515-1653.

**Attachments**

The tender documents and attachments can be accessed through the links below:

* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27497/202401333-b---solicitation-amendment-002---en.pdf
* https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform
